channel.title: Active Directory on ThinkBox
channel.description: Recent content in Active Directory on ThinkBox

item.title: Transferring and Seizing FSMO Roles
item.description: Introduction Within a Active Directory environment there are 5 Flexible single master operation (FSMO) roles that are present, they can either all be on a single domain controller or can be distributed between multiple. There are 2 FSMO roles that are forest wide and 3 that are domain wide. This post will describe the steps taken in order to either transfer a FSMO role to another server, or seize a FSMO role.
